task.summary: Default task
on logout in java set userValue attribute to null.
decreased height in mobile large modal
Uncommented login and signup buttons in the layout html
Added a new table in db - creations_backup. Now insert and update into this table too but I do not delete creations from this table so we will have all creations ever created.
Added mobile css back in index.html as meta 'viewport' wasn't working for small modals when mobile css was in app.css.
removed br tag on mobile site above creations.
added email tag to login and signup and added autocorrect and autocapitalize off for username, email and password fields
Made sure title and poem have content in order to save or update on the website. This is already the case on App.
New insert into creations_backup when user saves creation privately on phone. Save title, username, isPrivate true, date and poem with empty string.
Added update_count and delete_count in creations_backup and update_count in creations to record the actions on iPhone website and phone creations and browser creations.
Added forgotPassword link to html, js and java files (to see if email is in db). Didn't add 'send email' code.
Added code to send email. This works locally and remotely. Now, need to add link to email and new page on website with two password fields and email label.
Created a random password and send this in email for forgot password.
Change email and password options on pc browser.
Add settings options to mobile site. Didn't add forgot password yet.
Added About drop down with About and Contact Us link and created the contact us email sent to my email with user comments.
Fix getAllCreations when logged in so we get all creation if isprivate is false OR isprivate is true for the user logged in.
Changed isPrivate to isprivate for db sql statements.
Created ConnectResponse model (map of strings and List of creations) and now login sends this object to the front end. iPhone still only sends map of strings.
Return ConnectResponse object for signup.
Added focus and enter button functionality in modals.
removed enter button on confirm and error modals
css fix to mobile modals
added isPrivate to mobile modals.
fixed forgotPassword, changePassword and changeEmail to include username in call so that an email can have more than one account.
Made username in signup and forgot password capitalized.
Capitalize name in contact us.
Added contact us to mobile site.
Added favicon to website.
